data.title: Gateway Film Center
data.text:
Rory and Cobby are unlikely partners thrown together for a heist. But when it goes awry, they team up to outrun police, backward bureaucrats, and a vengeful crime boss. | Country: United States | Language: English

A father and teen daughter attend a pop concert, where they realize they’re at the center of a dark and sinister event. | Country: United Kingdom, Yemen, United States | Language: English

World Premiere at the 74th Berlin International Film Festival. Lia, a retired teacher living in Georgia, made a promise to find her long lost niece Tekla. The search takes her to Istanbul, a beautiful city that seems full of connections and possibilities. There she meets Evrim, a lawyer fighting for trans rights, and Tekla starts to feel closer than ever… | Country: Sweden, Denmark, Georgia, Turkey, France | Language: English, Georgian, Turkish

A listless Wade Wilson toils away in civilian life with his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. But when his homeworld faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit-up again with an even more reluctant Wolverine. | Country: United States | Language: English

World Premiere at the 2024 Berlin International Film Festival. Reluctantly, 17-year-old Gretchen leaves her American home to live with her father, who has just moved into a resort in the German Alps with his new family. | Country: United States | Language: English

Based on the best-selling video game, this all-star action-adventure follows a ragtag team of misfits on a mission to save a missing girl who holds the key to unimaginable power. | Country: United States | Language: English

In pursuit of a serial killer, an FBI agent uncovers a series of occult clues that she must solve to end his terrifying killing spree. | Country: United States | Language: English

Winner of the NEXT Audience Award at the 2024 Sundance Film Festival. There are 80,000 native Irish speakers in Ireland. 6,000 live in the North of Ireland. Three of them became a rap group called Kneecap. This anarchic Belfast trio becomes the unlikely figurehead of a civil rights movement to save the mother tongue. | Country: Ireland | Language: English, Irish Gaelic

Juliette and Carmen, two audacious sisters discovering a passage to the universe of their favorite book: “The Kingdom of the Winds” where they will be transformed and trapped. | Country: France, Belgium | Language: French, Belgian

The damndest thing you ever saw. Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention. | Country: United States | Language: English

The riotous inside story of the infamous sex, drugs and rock ‘n’ roll repertory cinema which inspired a generation during Britain’s turbulent Thatcher years. | Country: United Kingdom | Language: English

Experience this beautiful restoration of Francis Ford Coppola’s vivid Palme d’Or-winning war epic, the final presentation in the series. At the height of the Vietnam war, Captain Benjamin Willard is sent on a dangerous mission to locate – and eliminate – a mysterious Green Beret Colonel named Walter Kurtz, who has been leading his personal army on illegal guerrilla missions into enemy territory. | Country: United States | Language: English, French, Vietnamese
